keys: Hojas de operación (planning) del plan de estudios
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157946</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157946</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Characterizing children's sponaneous interests in Science and Technology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen der sponaneous Interessen der Kinder 
an der Wissenschaft und an der Technologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractériser les intérêts sponaneous des 
enfants dans la Science et la technologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caracterizando interesses sponaneous das crianças
na ciência e na tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratterizzare gli interessi sponaneous dei 
bambini nella scienza e nella tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηρισμός των sponaneous ενδιαφερόντων των 
παιδιών για την επιστήμη και την τεχνολογία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caracterizar los intereses sponaneous de los 
niños en ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article desribes the research done to determine the natural spontaneous interests of children for science. The research is based on questions children submitted to a series of Science Television programs and the implications of the results on Curriculum planning is discussed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Curriculum planning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">focus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel desribes die Forschung erfolgt, um 
die natürlichen spontanen Interessen der Kinder für Wissenschaft 
festzustellen. Die Forschung basiert auf den Fragen Kindern, die
bei einer Reihe Wissenschaft Fernsehenprogrammen eingegeben werden und
die Implikationen der Auswirkungen auf Lehrplanplanung wird behandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Desribes de cet article la recherche faite pour 
déterminer les intérêts spontanés normaux des enfants pour la 
science. La recherche est basée sur des enfants de questions 
soumis à une série d'émissions télévisées de la Science et les 
implications des résultats sur la planification de programme 
d'études est discutées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desribes deste artigo a pesquisa feita para 
determinar os interesses espontâneos naturais das crianças para a 
ciência. A pesquisa é baseada nas crianças das perguntas 
submetidas a uma série de programas da televisão da ciência e as 
implicações dos resultados no planeamento do curriculum são 
discutidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Desribes di questo articolo la ricerca fatta per 
determinare gli interessi spontanei naturali dei bambini per scienza. 
La ricerca è basata sui bambini di domande presentati ad una 
serie di programmi televisivi di scienza e le implicazioni dei 
risultati sulla pianificazione di programma di studi è discussa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο desribes η έρευνα που γίνεται για να 
καθορίσει τα φυσικά αυθόρμητα συμφέροντα των παιδιών για την 
επιστήμη. Η έρευνα είναι βασισμένη στα παιδιά ερωτήσεων 
που υποβάλλονται σε μια σειρά τηλεοπτικών προγραμμάτων επιστήμης 
και οι επιπτώσεις των αποτελεσμάτων στον προγραμματισμό 
προγράμματος σπουδών συζητούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desribes de este artículo la investigación hecha
para determinar los intereses espontáneos naturales de los niños 
para la ciencia. La investigación se basa en los niños de las 
preguntas sometidos a una serie de programas de la televisión de la 
ciencia y las implicaciones de los resultados en hojas de operación 
(planning) del plan de estudios se discuten.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrplanplanung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fokus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Planification de programme d'études</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">foyer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planeamento do curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">foco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianificazione di programma di studi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγραμματισμός προγράμματος σπουδών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
